Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.AmountTip.Value
Item.Value: Total contract amount. If the contract is created based on an order, the field becomes non-editable and is calculated as a total amount of products in the contract. The products are copied to the contract from the order. The field is editable, if the contract is not connected to an order Read more

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.ConvertOrdersCurrencyMessage.Value
Item.Value: Order currency for this contract will be converted into the base currency. Continue?

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.LinkProductCaption.Value
Item.Value: Which of the ordered products do you want to add to the contract {0}?

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.OrderTip.Value
Item.Value: If the [Account] field is specified, only orders for the selected account are available
